title: Against the Light
overview: A story set in the world of fashionable jewelry revolves around Bai Xining who hides her identity to unravel a secret while proving herself to be an outstanding jeweler. When Bai Xining was ten years old, she went from being a future heiress of a jewelry enterprise to completely penniless. Adopted by a Chinese couple in Australia, Bai Xining moves abroad and eventually discovers that her birth mother was framed. Fifteen years later, Xining joins the company that her mother once owned and finds herself in a power struggle between Li Zhuoran and Lin Yi as she unravels the truth behind her mother's imprisonment.
